column1: This sheet represents the master video playlist of Cortex Code demos from our internal teams. They will be featured on all our social channels when published.
Our goal is to provide you with an agile, relatively self-serve way to publish your demo videos.
If you'd like to add your video to this master playlist, 1) make sure a video below doesn't already exist. 2) submit your name and details below for review.
Questions? Ask Krista Rockson and Kevin Nguyen
Converting Streams + Tasks into Dynamic Tables
[Iceberg] Diagnosing and fixing the small file problem
[Openflow]  Setting up a Google Drive connector
